MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G81 postcode area of Clydebank. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:14pm. Our emergency response team have arrived in the local area and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:15am. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:35pm on Monday, 26 April 2021
